definitions.definition: A sudden movement out of a straight line, for example to avoid a collision.
A deviation from duty or custom.
Synonym of drift ( “ sideways movement imparted by spin bowler ” ) .

main_definition: A sudden movement out of a straight line, for example to avoid a collision.
secondary_definitions: A deviation from duty or custom.
( cricket ) Synonym of drift ( “ sideways movement imparted by spin bowler ” ) .
